DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Automated Bolus Calculation Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes > 1 year Age 18 year old HbA1C > 64 mmol/mol ( 8.0 % ) Treatment multiple daily insulin injection ( basal prandial insulin ) ≥ 6 month GADantibody negative Naïve bolus calculator Pregnancy breast feeding Gastroparesis Severe nephropathy ( eGFR < 30 mL/min/1,73 m2 ) Use sulfonylurea
